author: jeremias
msg: Bugfix: Certain border styles could lead to a NullPointerException.
inset and groove are now mapped to RTF's "engrave", outset and ridge to "emboss". If no mapping can be found the "solid" style is used. Before null was returned which was the cause for the NPE.

author: gnodet
msg: Patch provided by Jonathan Edwards. Thanks !

author: aco
msg: -Added a list script that will list all registered brokers
-Added a bstat script that will run a predefined query to display some broker stats and selected attributes. (i.e. bstat <broker name>, or bstat to display the statistics of all brokers)
- Updated copyright header of script files.

author: aco
msg: Change subtractive query to use -xQ and --xobjname instead of !. Having trouble using ! in linux.
